answers.answer: Hi!If you were working outdoors or exercising, the trickling down sensation can be due to sweat trickling down.Otherwise any abnormal sensation such as trickling down sensation with a feeling of warmth can be due to clot in a vein or deep vein thrombosis or due to peripheral neuropathies secondary to diabetes, thyroid disorders, Lyme's or lupus.Since I cannot examine you and know other related conditions you may be having, nor is a detailed history possible on net, I have listed the various possibilities that should be looked into. Please consult your PCP for primary examination followed by proper referral. Take care!

question: this morning i woke up with a tingling sensation from my chest down to my left breast and it feels like a warm sensation trikling down at the same time what could it be should i be alrmed?
title: tingling pain down the left breast
